goal.ch:
學習軟體工程的理論與實務。
理論部分透過教課書的教學。實務部份透過個案式的課堂教學以及期末專案來進行。
goal.en:
Learning the theoretical and practical aspects of software engineering.
The theoretical side is taught using the textbook teaching.
The practical side is learned through the case-based teaching in class and the term project.

outline.ch:
上課要求:
1. Term project: this is a very important learning process for the class.
2. Please bring textbook every time.
outline.en:
1. Term project: this is a very important learning process for the class.
2. Please bring textbook every time.

textbook.ch:
"教科書:
Object-Oriented Software Engineering: Using UML, Patterns, and Java, 2nd Edition, Prentice Hall,
Bernd Bruegge & Allen H. Dutoit
補充教材：
1.製商整合e化個案集（第二冊） -- 成衣紡織業e化全球運籌管理個案 （聚陽實業公司）  請自行準備
2.業界專案資料 （需簽具保密條約才可使用） 可自Blackboard下載
甲、農學社專案
乙、台泥專案"
textbook.en:
"Object-Oriented Software Engineering: Using UML, Patterns, and Java, 2nd Edition, Prentice Hall,
Bernd Bruegge & Allen H. Dutoit"

instructMethod.ch:
講授
研討

個別指導
其他

gradMethod.ch:
Term project: 50%
期末考 (open book exam): 40%
熟讀補充資料 10% (採扣分方式計分，每次被點到而完全不知所云，則扣一分，共十分可以扣。建議你花約十小時將所有補充教材一次讀完，以後上課討論時你至少知道到哪翻，就可輕鬆得到這十分)
gradMethod.en:
Term project: 50%
final(open book exam): 40%
course participation: 10%

ch.competencies: 獨立思考和解決問題能力

ch: 系所:限資訊管理學系碩士班。年級:限一年級。
系所:限資訊管理學系碩士班、資訊管理學系博士班。
en: Department:Master of Information Management only.Year:First Year only.
Department:Master of Information Management、PhD in Information Management only.
